ActJudges Act
SubjectKatherine Scarth ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. William B. Scarth **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to KATHERINE SCARTH, survivor of the Hon. William B. Scarth, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective August 10, 2017.
